arm_group.description:
One sachets (1 gram of content) will be consumed once a day, and will be suspended in a provided milk powder to be reconstituted with water.
The duration of the treatment is 5 months.

One sachets (1 gram of content) will be consumed once a day, and will be suspended in a provided milk powder to be reconstituted with water.
The duration of the treatment is 5 months.

brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of the planned study is to investigate the effect of heat-treated lactobacilli
      on diarrhea outcome in healthy children 1-4 years old in a randomized, double-blind,
      placebo-controlled study.

detailed_description.textblock:
The beneficial effect of heat-treated lactobacilli for treatment of symptomatic diarrhea was
      clearly documented and the purpose of this planned study is to investigate the effect on
      reduction of days with diarrhea in a preventive setting in healthy children 1-4 years old.
      Moreover, the study is intended to evaluate the impact on the immune status of the children.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          1. Parents written and signed informed consent for participation in the study: parents
             agree with the participation in the study, dated and signed informed consent form
             prior to any study related procedure.

          2. Healthy children aged 1 to 4 years

          3. No more breastfed.

          4. Daily home cared and going to a selected pediatrician.

          5. Parents must have a phone at home or a cellular phone to call the paediatrician.

          6. No consumption of commercial products containing probiotics and / or prebiotics
             during the 3 weeks before and during the study period.

          7. Children not being intensive consumers of regular yoghurts

          8. Parents are able to keep a daily record of symptoms and to administrate the study
             products.

        Exclusion Criteria:

          1. Vaccine administration within the last 3 months prior study start.

          2. Used antibiotics within the last month

          3. Congenital or chronic disease.

          4. Any kind of immunodeficiency or allergy.

          5. Acute infection or fever.

          6. Significant illness within the two weeks prior to the start of the study.

intervention.description: Daily supplement of sachet with 1 g of powder over a 5 months period.

facility.name: Centro de Estudios Clinicos de Queretaro S.c.

clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Study to Investigate the Effect of Heat-treated Lactobacilli on Infections and Immune Status in Healthy Children

overall_official.affiliation: Center of Clinical Research of Querétaro

oversight_info.authority: Mexico: Federal Commission for Sanitary Risks Protection

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of episodes of upper respiratory infections
